entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
